description: The user properties to apply when identifying. This is not an event definition. These properties must all be device independent.

ftueUseCaseSelection.description: The selected messaging use case during the onboarding flow.

oneOf.description: The first option, Friends and family.
The footer option to skip the question.

numSpaces.description: Number of spaces (and sub-spaces) the user is joined to.

numFavouriteRooms.description: Number of joined rooms the user has favourited.

WebMetaSpaceHomeEnabled.description: Whether the user has the home space enabled.

WebMetaSpaceHomeAllRooms.description: Whether the user has the home space set to all rooms.

WebMetaSpacePeopleEnabled.description: Whether the user has the people space enabled.

WebMetaSpaceFavouritesEnabled.description: Whether the user has the favourites space enabled.

WebMetaSpaceOrphansEnabled.description: Whether the user has the other rooms space enabled.
